channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins DeployHub Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins DeployHub Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2156|2024-08-04T07:01:40.730Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployhub%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins DeployHub Plugin 8.0.14 and earlier transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2019-10286|2024-08-04T22:17:19.651Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployhub%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins DeployHub Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.
